metadata.name: Logged-On User Password Change Via Ksetup.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects password change for the logged-on user's via "ksetup.exe"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\ksetup.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('ksetup.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /changepassword ')))

output.summary: Detects password change for the logged-on user's via "ksetup.exe"
